title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If the key is blank, the externalized text can't be displayed in the chart.
OB: When trying to add a localization key with a blank value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, even if the key is blank, it should still have a valid value. The expected result is that the externalized text can be displayed in the chart title.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set an externalized text in the chart title.
2. Leave the key blank.
